text:
Uncomfortable Truth for Consultants:

I replace you for $50 and three AI:

You need three AI tools to do 80% of the job.

✦ Perplexity to search.
✦ ChatGPT to reason.
✦ Gamma to make slides. 

Here's exactly how:

1. Perplexity to search.

Copy & paste this prompt:

"Act like a McKinsey senior consultant. Execute a DMAIC-driven Deep Research workflow—Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve, and Control data on [XXX]—structuring findings in MECE-compliant categories into an extensive executive summary."

Pro tip: Use their "Research" model (paid plan).

2. ChatGPT to reason.

Copy & paste this prompt:

"Act like a McKinsey senior consultant. Findings below:
 [PASTE PERPLEXITY'S ANSWER HERE]. Deduplicate, flag gaps, then distill into 5 MECE insights, 80/20 lens.

For each insight:
 • Line 1 – ALL-CAPS headline
 • Lines 2-4 – up to three evidence sentences
 • Line 5 – one strategic-implication sentence
Leave one blank line between insights.

 After the insights, add three sections in the same format: UNKNOWN GAPS (3 sentences) QUICK WINS (2 sentences) BOLD HYPOTHESIS (1 sentence)"

3. Gamma to make slides.

☑ Go to "Generate with AI".
☑ Copy & paste ChatGPT's answer.
☑ Generate an 8-20 slide deck of your findings.

Gamma knows your style. Everything can be edited.

It even generates the images/charts for you, with AI.

Total cost: $20 Perplexity + $20 ChatGPT + $10 Gamma. And that's PER MONTH.

How can junior consultants compete with this?
